responses.rationale: Describes securing vaccine doses ('secure over 40 million doses') without linking to current calm or safety.
Describes securing vaccine doses ('secures up to 665,000 doses', 'option for a further 40 million') without linking to current calm or safety.
Describes the procurement process ('will be jointly procured') without linking to current calm or safety.
Describes the intended use of doses ('intended for those most exposed') without linking to current calm or safety.
Describes other countries securing doses ('in the process of securing preventative vaccine doses') without linking to current calm or safety.
